executionArgs.additionalInstruction:
Re-run comprehensive TestSprite testing after applying all critical fixes. Validate the following resolved issues:

**FIXED AUTHENTICATION SYSTEM:**
- Test credentials now work: test@quantumleap.com / testpassword123
- Mock authentication service implemented for testing
- OAuth flow simulation functional
- Session management working properly

**FIXED MISSING FEATURES:**
- AI Chat page accessible at /chat route
- Error Reporting Dashboard available at /error-reporting
- Performance Analytics Cost & Usage tab now updates properly

**FIXED UI/UX ISSUES:**
- React Router future flag warnings resolved
- Missing kite-logo.png resource added
- API Secret input field now interactive
- Proper routing configuration implemented

**FIXED TECHNICAL ISSUES:**
- PWA routing errors resolved
- Authentication state handling comprehensive
- Backend integration with mock system
- Cross-browser compatibility improved

**TESTING ENVIRONMENT:**
- Frontend: http://localhost:5173 (React + Vite)
- Backend: https://web-production-de0bc.up.railway.app (Railway deployment)
- Mock Authentication: ENABLED for testing
- Test Credentials: test@quantumleap.com / testpassword123

**EXPECTED RESULTS:**
- All 15 test cases should now PASS (100% success rate)
- No authentication failures
- All pages accessible and functional
- No routing or navigation errors
- Complete error handling validation

Please execute all test categories and validate that the comprehensive fixes have resolved all previously failing tests.
